item.description:
We were formly know as the ASSOCIATION OF REAL ESTATE INVESTORS-SOUTH. Now Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association. We have supported investors in New England for over 15 years. Seasoned Investors to new ones COME JOIN US to figure out the best ways to buy and sell property in this market.

Pay only $15 by preregistering.
SAVE MONEY OFF THE DOOR FEE BY REGISTERING EARLY AND GUARENTEE SEATING AS IT IS LIMITED. The door fee is now $25. You can save $10 by preregistering.


To register follow the link to a great company we are affiliated with Foreclosuresmass.

http://www.foreclosur...

Pay only $15 dollars by preregistering now.

If you have trouble following the link copy and paste it to your browser.

Look forward to seeing many new faces this month.

See you there,

Derek Ebrecht
Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investment Association September Meetup
